daily_activities: Morning: Hiking to the highest peak in the Caribbean for breathtaking views
Afternoon: Adventure Sports - snorkeling in the crystal-clear waters
Evening: Nightlife - exploring the local bars and clubs
Morning: Sightseeing - visiting the historic forts and landmarks
Afternoon: Museums - learning about the rich history and culture of the Caribbean
Evening: Dining - trying the local cuisine at a beachside restaurant
Morning: Shopping - browsing the local markets for unique souvenirs
Afternoon: Adventure Sports - kayaking through the bioluminescent bay
Evening: Nightlife - enjoying live music and dancing at a beach party
Morning: Hiking - exploring the lush rainforests and waterfalls
Afternoon: Sightseeing - taking a boat tour to see the stunning coral reefs
Evening: Dining - having a romantic dinner at a fine dining restaurant
Morning: Museums - visiting a museum to learn about the marine life
Afternoon: Shopping - buying last-minute souvenirs and gifts
Evening: Nightlife - ending the trip with a bang at a rooftop bar

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major airport in the United States or Europe, then connect to a flight to a Caribbean island such as Jamaica, Barbados, or the Bahamas. Possible routes include Ahmedabad (AMD) to New York (JFK) to Kingston (KIN) or Ahmedabad (AMD) to London (LHR) to St. Lucia (UVF)
